name: Viral Runner
description:
Viral Runner is a first person endless runner platformer where the player must jump from platform to platform to avoid being killed by the firewall.

Enter a username in the pause menu to have it show on the leaderboard

Controls:

Escape key to open the pause menu

WASD to move

Mouse motion to look

hold Control or Mouse1 to crouch

hold Shift or Mouse2 to sprint

hold crouch key while against a wall to climb it

hold sprint and crouch keys to slide

Credits:

Online leaderboard stuff: Lootlocker.com

SFX and textures: Kenney.nl
